question: Which Indian Sprinter has featured  TIME magazine’s 100 Next, a new list of the most influential people in the world?
explanation: TIME magazine has named Indian athlete Dutee Chand to its first-ever TIME 100 Next, a new expansion of the TIME 100 list of the most influential people in the world.The list highlights 100 rising stars who are shaping the future of business, entertainment, sports, politics, health, science and activism, and more. The striking feature about the recent editions is the growing number of individuals who did not need an establishment to command international attention--people like Parkland students (in 2018) and Greta Thunberg (in 2019).
